sentences.en: Sampras beat Carl-Uwe Steeb by 6-1, 6-2, 6-1 to underline the legitimacy of his challenge for the title.
sentences.cn: 桑普拉斯以6比1、6比2和6比1战胜了卡尔-尤韦·斯蒂布，证明了他挑战冠军头衔的合理性。

sentences.en: Time, rather than intention, has given them legitimacy.
sentences.cn: 时间，而不是意图，赋予了他们合法性。

sentences.en: These ethnic- and class-based traditions themselves challenged the legitimacy of patriarchal marriage.
sentences.cn: 这些基于种族和阶级的传统本身就挑战了父权婚姻的合法性。
